title: No Pool Party and Project skins this year?
body: What happened to them?Did riot talk about them?If they did comment so i can see.

replies.body: We're combining the skins into PROJECT: POOL PARTY. Please stand by.
Is this real... or a joke XD
do not play with out bank accounts  feelings mister

> [{quoted}](name=Riot TreblMuffin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rdM2PUXo,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-09-10T23:47:47.815+0000)
>
> We're combining the skins into PROJECT: POOL PARTY. Please stand by.

please let this be true.
Project Orianna pool party incoming then? :D

Please do not put water on an electrical fire.
Unless a fire extinguisher or fire blanket is available please vacate the premises as calmly and quickly as possible.
It is important to inform the fire department of the on-going event and await their arrival patiently.

Cool, 2 skin sets I don't like combined into 1, now we'll have more of other original skins.

Btw i know its Rito doing a joke
Dont play with my heart like that

So that means a skin for  {{champion:267}}?

Robot Nami. Not sure how to feel about this...

LOL please no cybernetic water.
Unless we wanna see the servers explode from particle overload of course.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

Real talk though: glad you gave us a bit of a break to cool off from those two.
Gonna be hype when they come kack. :3
No project skins is no loss.  Pool party can be hit or miss.

> [{quoted}](name=Bladerunner7777,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rdM2PUXo,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-09-10T20:31:33.702+0000)
>
> Project > Star Guardian

Maybe but both are of lower tier.
How is Star Guardian low tier? The skins are probably higher quality than more 1350 skins?
Agreed. I thought the Omega Squad skins were good though
They're probably taking a short break with them. I'm guessing we'll see them next year hopefully.

Well they have done no Pool Party skins for a year before, sometimes you need to take a break from a skin line so it doesn't get stale. Granted this year we did have Pool Party Chromas which basically was our pool party content for this year. PROJECT could still possibly happen but like I said they might be taking a break this year for PROJECT
Maybe they just figure that each had too many and decided to expand upon sets that didn't have as many skins or start new ones altogether. Just my personal theory ;)
